name: GPT-750M-1024-Domain-Adaptation
description: Domain adaptation config for 750M reasoning model. Lower LR + shorter warmup to preserve base knowledge while learning domains (IT security, protocols, Bash, Python/JS/Java docs, Swiss Law DE/EN). 220M tokens (70% domain + 30% replay), 5 epochs (~1.1B token views). Use with --init_from_model.
